field.value:
While reviewing ActiveRecord source code, I noticed that ActiveRecordBase, ActiveRecordBaseQuery, CountQuery, ProjectionQuery and ScalarProjectionQuery have repeated code. I factored out the methods AddCriterionToCriteria and AddOrderToCriteria into CriteriaHelper. I considered consolidating query support for Criteria into ActiveRecordBaseQuery, but that should be reserved for a second patch. I exercised my current application, but didn't run the unit tests for this trivial change.
Ideally, ICriteria would have AddRange(IEnumerable) and AddOrderRange(IEnumerable) methods. I will ask on NHIbernate forum about this.
